summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 776 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 1.7°C), and light levels (up 2625 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 721.8m higher than yesterday, 176.1m lower than the past week, 776.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 1987.5m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2160m and 2760m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.
